item.description:
1 - We will visit The Hall - Tickets $10
2 - Then head for a late lunch at 2:00pm - CBS Scene
3 - After lunch Shopping - split into groups or solo
4 - Meet up again at 6:00pm to see a movie or live entertainment
5 - Ending with adult beverage and/or desert
See descriptions below for above (subject to change)

Meet at 12:00pm at "The Hall" entrance – please call if you will be late

The Hall Highlights:
• 4,500-sqft. grand hall – "Patriots United" with 45-ft. cathedral ceiling alive with Patriots video/photos
• "Patriots Way" feature film presented in panoramic theatre
• Four 30-ft. tall, interactive video pylons honoring Patriots Hall of Famers
• Patriots history comes alive through touch, feel and sound interaction

The Hall Interactive Exhibits:
• All 3 Super Bowl Vince Lombardi trophies
• Relive the greatest kick in Patriots history in the 16-ft. geodesic dome with sharp temperature drop and snow squall
• Personal items from former players and stories in their own voices
• "In the Game" takes visitors within the huddle, onto the bench and into the playbook - experience interactions between players and coaches during a game
• Unique and loyal fans of the New England Patriots

Late lunch at 2pm - CBS Scene Restaurant & Bar – reservations for 12 have been made
American cuisine freshly prepared from scratch. Features 137 state-of-the-projector, as well as a 360-sqft. projection wall. Terrace as you overlooks Gillette Stadium.

Shopping
Bass Pro Shops, Bed Bath & Beyond, Christmas Tree Shops, Circuit City, Fossil, Off Broadway Shoes, Patriots ProShop, Puma, Reebok, Victoria Secret

Showcase Cinema De Lux
State-of-the-art theater-experience offering14 giant screens
Luxury in-theater dining/drink service

Showcase Live
16,000-sqft.world class live entertainment venue
Performer: TREBEK - energetic blend of rock, fun and R&B

Adult Beverages, more dining and desert
Blue Fin, Red Robin, Tastings Wine Bar & Bistro, Baskin Robbins

Please provide set up fee of $1.00 to Organizer upon event arrival - thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a Meet Up lanyard on.
item.name: NE Patriots Bye-Week Field Trip
